events.message: I received the wrong item in my last order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund faster?
Sure, my order number is 4589123, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item I received.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email once processed.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate how fast you are addressing this issue.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is settled with your recent order.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
We would appreciate if you could complete a short survey to rate your support experience regarding this refund process.
